articles.author: Ravi Sinha
articles.title: 3 times Ben Stokes changed a Test match with his bowling - Sportskeeda
articles.description: Ben Stokes made a crucial impact with the ball as he trapped Australian stalwart Steve Smith lbw to put the tourists under pressure on Day 2 of the first Ashes Test at Edgbaston, Birmingham on Saturda
